title: What are some examples of holistic medicine?
description: Answer (1 of 9): Aaah, 'holism'. The word was invented by the rather bright South African pictured above, Field Marshal Jan Christiaan Smuts, who was also an interesting fellow. He initially fought against the British in the Second Boer War, and then fought for the British in the First World War...
